listAllInvestments() - Method in class com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioManager
Returns a formatted string detailing the name, symbol, average purchase price, current value and amount of each asset within the portfolio.
listAllInvestments() - Method in interface com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioSystem
Returns a formatted string detailing the name, symbol, average purchase price, current value and amount of each asset within the portfolio.
listPortfolioAssetsByName(List<String>) - Method in class com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioManager
Retrieve a formatted String containing details on all of the assets within the portfolio matching the assetName in full or partially.
listPortfolioAssetsByName(List<String>) - Method in interface com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioSystem
Retrieve a formatted String containing details on all of the assets within the portfolio matching the assetName in full or partially.
listPortfolioAssetsByType(String) - Method in class com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioManager
Retrieve a formatted string containing all of the assets within the portfolio of the specified asset type ("stock" or "cryptocurrencies").
listPortfolioAssetsByType(String) - Method in interface com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioSystem
Retrieve a formatted string containing all of the assets within the portfolio of the specified asset type ("stock" or "cryptocurrencies").
listPortfolioPurchasesInRange(long, long) - Method in class com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioManager
Retrieve a formatted String containing summary information for all assets within the portfolio purchased between the dates startTimeStamp and endTimeStamp.
listPortfolioPurchasesInRange(long, long) - Method in interface com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioSystem
Retrieve a formatted String containing summary information for all assets within the portfolio purchased between the dates startTimeStamp and endTimeStamp.
listPortfolioSalesInRange(long, long) - Method in class com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioManager
Retrieve a formatted string containing a summary of all the assets sales between the dates startTimeStamp and endTimeStamp.
listPortfolioSalesInRange(long, long) - Method in interface com.lyit.csd.domain.PortfolioSystem
